title: The Men In Science Majors
alternative_title: Rikedan! I will be the manager of a singles' dormitory...?! ; Rikedan! ~ Watashi ga dokushin ryō no kanrinin ni…!? ; リケダン！ ～私が独身寮の管理人に…!?
status: Rikedan! I will be the manager of a singles' dormitory...?! ; Rikedan! ~ Watashi ga dokushin ryō no kanrinin ni…!? ; リケダン！ ～私が独身寮の管理人に…!?
description:
Description :
        Erika Tanaka, unemployed and disappointed after being dumped by the man she was in love with, becomes the manager of a bachelor's dormitory where elite science-minded men gather. However, it's a den of rather uncool science-minded men with zero love skills!? A new type of harem drawn by the author of 'Cinderella with Broken Heels'!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 3: Contact From My Ex-Boyfriend
Vol.1 Chapter 2: The Other Side Of Kindness
